task.title: Updatae an Existing Address
task.shortdesc: Students are asked to regularly verify and update address information on record with the university through the MyPack Portal student information system.

taskbody.prereq: You must have access to MyPack Portal and have an existing address on file that you want to update.

step.info: You will find it from the left-hand nevigation menu

step.cmd: Click on the address box under the appropriate header (e.g. 'Home Address')
Update the address fields as necessary
